scripts.development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=dev webpack --mode development --config webpack.client.config.js --mode development --config webpack.server.config.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-server-dev && npm run build-client-dev
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-server-prod && npm run build-client-prod
scripts.build-client-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=dev webpack --mode development --config webpack.client.config.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.build-server-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=dev webpack --mode development --config webpack.server.config.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.build-client-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=prod webpack --mode production --config webpack.client.config.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.build-server-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=prod webpack --mode production --config webpack.server.config.js --progress --hide-modules
